Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class GameStateManager

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.GameStateManager
public class GameStateManager extends Object
Manages saving and loading game state to disk using JSON files. Players can save their progress in story mode and resume later from the same point. Each save slot is stored as a separate JSON file (slot1.json, slot2.json, etc.).

  • Constructor Details

    • GameStateManager

      public GameStateManager()

  • Method Details

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame(int slot, GameStateManager.SaveState state)
      Saves the current game state to a JSON file on disk. The file is named "slotX.json" where X is the slot number (1, 2, or 3). Overwrites any existing save in that slot.
      Parameters:
      slot - the save slot number (1, 2, or 3)
      state - the complete game state to save

    • loadGame

      public static GameStateManager.SaveState loadGame(int slot)
      Loads a saved game state from disk. Returns null if the save file doesn't exist or is corrupted.
      Parameters:
      slot - the save slot number to load from (1, 2, or 3)
      Returns:
      the loaded game state, or null if loading failed

    • deleteSave

      public static void deleteSave(int slot)
      Deletes a save file from disk. Used when the player wants to clear a save slot.
      Parameters:
      slot - the save slot number to delete (1, 2, or 3)
